O Good One and Lover of Mankind, my Lord Jesus, I beg you, cast me not to Your left with the goats, the sinners.

With the voice of the tax collector, I cry out and say, â€œO God, forgive me, for I am a sinner.â€?

â€œI have sinned, I have sinned. My Lord Jesus, forgive me; for there is no servant without sin, nor master without forgiveness.â€?
